entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
